;; Sat, 25 Nov 2023 05:56:04 +0800 01版要闻 - 携手将数字贸易打造成为共同发展的新引擎（走进市场看信心）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/25/nw.D110000renmrb_20231125_2-01.htm
;Saturday, November 25, 2023
; ;

;On the banks of the Qiantang River, in the warm winter, the Hangzhou International Expo Center welcomes guests from all over the world. From November 23 to 27, the second Global Digital Trade Expo was held here.

;

;President Xi Jinping sent a congratulatory letter to the Second Global Digital Trade Expo and pointed out: "Currently, global digital trade is booming and has become a new highlight of international trade." "We hope that all parties will make full use of the Global Digital Trade Expo platform to jointly Cooperate, promote development, and share results, and work together to build digital trade into a new engine for common development and inject new momentum into world economic growth."

;

;Walking in the digital trade exhibition hall, you can see more possibilities brought by the development of the digital economy. Digital trade is no longer just physical commodity trade through digital technology. Cross-border e-commerce, online payment, online education, telemedicine... As the leading force in the world's technological revolution and industrial transformation, digital technology is increasingly integrated into all fields of economic and social development. The entire process has profoundly changed production methods, lifestyles and social governance methods, empowering all walks of life to accelerate transformation and upgrading.

;

;;Cutting-edge products are displayed together, and digital trade is booming;

;

;This digital trade fair will set up a comprehensive pavilion, a cutting-edge trend pavilion and a Silk Road e-commerce pavilion. There are 2 special exhibition halls, as well as 4 professional halls of digital technology, digital services, digital content and digital smart travel. The rich and diverse digital products, applications and services make people feel that digital trade has long been integrated into all aspects of production and life.

;

;In the comprehensive hall, a cool-looking robot waves its mechanical arm and plays chess with the audience. This is an artificial intelligence robot brought by SenseTime Technology. "This is an industrial interactive robot that integrates artificial intelligence and robotic arms. Through visual positioning and robotic arm execution, it can achieve 'hand-eye coordination' and achieve millimeter-level precise operations to ensure smooth operation during chess playing. , accurate placement, bringing users an immersive interactive experience." said the booth staff.

;

;In the Frontier Trends Pavilion, many companies displayed various large-scale models exploring cutting-edge technologies in the fields of education, medical care, city, office, automobile, human-computer interaction and other fields. The large-scale traffic model exhibited by Baidu Intelligent Cloud can use global sensing data to determine the possibility of congestion, superimpose simulation and deduction, generate a global signal control plan, and automatically optimize the signal light timing plan. According to estimates, after the deployment of global information control in Yizhuang, Beijing, the average passing time at intersections has been shortened by 28%.

;

;The artificial intelligence painting online creation platform demonstrated by Tencent only takes 5 seconds to combine the input text or pictures to intelligently create image content related to the input, including intelligent text-based drawings, intelligent drawing-based drawings, and artificial drawings. Intelligent photo taking, video animation and other capabilities. “This product can be widely used in scenarios such as literary illustrations, cultural communication, style transformation, and design assistance,” said a relevant Tencent staff member.

;

;In recent years, my country’s digital trade has developed vigorously and has gradually become an important engine for building a strong trading nation. In 2022, my country's digitally deliverable service trade scale will reach 2.51 trillion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 7.8%, ranking fifth in the world. According to customs statistics, in 2022, my country's cross-border e-commerce imports and exports reached 2.11 trillion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 9.8%, setting a record high. In the first three quarters of this year, my country's cross-border e-commerce import and export reached 1.7 trillion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 14.4%.

;

;;Accelerate digital transformation and improve factor allocation efficiency;

;

;Enter the Silk Road E-commerce Pavilion of this digital trade fair, e-commerce platforms, and cross-border logistics E-commerce industry chain platform companies such as mobile payment and cloud services gather here to communicate and learn from each other.

;

;“In China, the integration of digitalization and foreign trade has begun long ago, and cross-border e-commerce is one of the representatives. Digitalization has penetrated into product research and development, manufacturing, operations management, marketing, etc., and is moving towards all-round Target development of digitalization." Dai Jianfei, global vice president of Amazon, said that in order to further leverage the advantages of China's supply chain and help more traditional manufacturing companies, Amazon promotes the combination of "cross-border e-commerce + industrial belt" and connects with end customers. Gradually transform and upgrade to digitalization.

;

;Integrating digitalization throughout the entire process of commodity trade, Wuchan Zhongda Cloud Merchants has joined forces with high-quality partners in the industry chain to build a platform based on big data analysis that integrates content operations, data analysis, and e-commerce live broadcasting. Digital integrated comprehensive services provide customers at home and abroad with one-stop material procurement e-commerce platform services. "In the era of digital economy, traditional industries must continue to provide customers with more accurate and personalized solutions through digital means, thereby gaining more opportunities." said Dai Xiaomin, senior manager of Wuchan Zhongda Cloud Commerce.

;

;Traditional enterprises have found new development opportunities on the track of digital transformation. "Steel was made here before, but now data is made here." As a traditional steel company, Hangzhou Iron and Steel Group has taken advantage of its factories, energy, industrial chain and other advantages to enter the digital economy track starting from the construction of data centers. The exhibition area shows the Hangzhou Iron and Steel Cloud Calculate the operation of the data center. The servers in the park run day and night to provide computing power support for the industry. Zhang Jiancheng, deputy secretary of the Party Committee and general manager of Hangzhou Iron and Steel Group, said that traditional enterprises should seize the opportunities given by industrial digitization and digital industrialization, vigorously develop the digital technology industry, create new momentum for enterprise development and growth, open up new space, and promote the transformation and upgrading of traditional industries. .

;

;On the big screen is the research and development scene of young scientists who have returned from overseas. On the booth is the entire process of biotechnology products using digital technology from research and development to production... When you walk into the booth of Hangzhou Chuanhua Technology City, the smell of digital medicine hits your face. Come. "With the help of digital technology, we will build a science and technology innovation platform for the biotechnology industry and form advanced industrial clusters to help scientists start and innovate and science and technology enterprises to grow rapidly. At present, we have introduced and cultivated more than 100 biotechnology companies." Hangzhou Chuanhua Science and Technology City Co., Ltd. President Chen Tao said.

;

;At the digital trade conference, many companies have this consensus: China has massive data resources and rich trade digital application scenarios, and has unique advantages in developing digital trade. In 2022, the scale of my country's digital economy will reach 50.2 trillion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 10.3%, accounting for 41.5% of the GDP; my country's data output will reach 8.1ZB, a year-on-year increase of 22.7%, accounting for 10.5% of the world, ranking first in the world. two. As of June this year, the number of Internet users in my country reached 1.079 billion.

;

;;Discuss and cooperate together to promote development and cultivate new drivers of world economic growth;

;

;On the first day of the opening of the Digital Trade Fair, the United Nations International Trade Center and Alibaba International The Digital Business Group has signed a memorandum of understanding to jointly improve the competitiveness of micro, small and medium-sized enterprises in developing countries in the e-commerce sector. According to the memorandum, the two parties will promote the development of micro, small and medium-sized enterprises in developing countries by improving visibility, creating new business opportunities and increasing their e-commerce knowledge and capabilities.

;

;In 2021, Alibaba International Station and the United Nations International Trade Center jointly launched the "Digital Trade Accelerator for Small and Medium-sized Enterprises in Global Developing Countries" program. In the African region, small, medium and micro enterprises in 22 countries, including South Africa, Egypt, Kenya and Morocco, are "selling globally" through Alibaba International Station with one click and conveniently participating in global trade.

;

;At the Digital Trade Conference, iFlytek demonstrated implementation cases of the iFlytek Spark cognitive model in education, office, finance, industry, medical and other industries. “iFlytek will continue to rely on its long-term accumulation in the field of cognitive intelligence, work with global partners to promote the innovation and application of artificial intelligence technology, provide diversified and competitive services, and jointly create an ecosystem for mutual benefit and win-win results. Explore innovative solutions for digital trade and use artificial intelligence to build a better world." said Sun Dongping, vice president of iFlytek and general manager of Zhejiang iFlytek Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd.

;

;At the 2023 Digital Healthcare Industry Conference held during the Digital Trade Fair, representatives from Zhejiang University School of Medicine, Zhejiang Provincial People's Hospital, AstraZeneca, Takeda Pharmaceutical and other representative scientific research institutes, medical institutions and enterprises Co-initiated the establishment of the Digital Healthcare Professional Committee. "Zhejiang has a leading advantage in the digital economy, and Hangzhou has formed significant industrial characteristics in the field of biomedicine, providing strong support for us to build a digital medical innovation ecosystem. AstraZeneca will join hands with more partners to actively explore big data, artificial intelligence The ecological link between emerging technologies such as intelligence and the medical industry provides comprehensive support for the development of high-quality digital medical innovation." said Lai Minglong, general manager of AstraZeneca China.

;

;Digital trade is a booming new form of trade with huge development potential. At the same time, it faces risks and challenges. The rules, regulations, management and standards in the field of digital trade need to be continuously refined based on practice, which requires global cooperation. cooperation and jointly promote development.

;

;At the Digital Trade Conference, the "China Digital Trade Development Report 2022" released by the Ministry of Commerce showed that currently, more than 120 regional and bilateral trade agreements around the world contain digital trade rules. Relevant rules have been upgraded from trade facilitation issues to building a safe, orderly, and risk-controllable free trade system.

;

;Strengthen and optimize the national digital services export base, implement the Regional Comprehensive Economic Partnership (RCEP) with high quality, and actively promote joining the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and the Digital Economy Partnership Agreement (DEPA) process, actively participate in WTO e-commerce negotiations, maintain and improve the multilateral digital economy governance system... Adhering to the development concept of open cooperation and win-win, our country seizes the development opportunities of the digital economy and actively participates in international exchanges Cooperation will continue to bring new impetus and new opportunities to the world with China's new development.

; ;

;On November 24, President Xi Jinping sent a congratulatory letter to the World Congress of China Studies·Shanghai Forum, profoundly clarifying the importance of China studies The important significance expresses the ardent expectations for experts and scholars from various countries to be good messengers of Chinese and foreign civilizations, and arouses strong resonance among the Chinese and foreign guests attending the meeting and all walks of life.

;

;Everyone said that President Xi Jinping’s congratulatory letter provided important guidance for promoting exchanges and mutual learning among civilizations and promoting the prosperity and development of Chinese studies around the world. Next, we will use this forum as an opportunity to further strengthen academic exchanges and research results. Transform and contribute more wisdom and power to the inheritance, development and innovation of different civilizations.

;

;;Let the world better know and understand China;

;

;From participating in the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum to participating in this world China Studies Conference·Shanghai Forum, Charles Onunayiju, Director of the Nigeria China Studies Center, was deeply touched. He said that President Xi Jinping has always attached great importance to dialogue among civilizations and international exchanges. This congratulatory letter clearly proposed a series of new views and concepts, providing new ideas and new enlightenment for us to understand China from multiple angles and fields.

;

;“President Xi Jinping pointed out in his congratulatory letter that Sinology is the study of historical China as well as contemporary China. It succinctly and concisely points out the connotation and extension of Sinology and has guiding significance for the study of Sinology.” At the opening of the forum. After listening to President Xi Jinping’s congratulatory message live during the ceremony, Zhang Weiwei, dean of the China Institute at Fudan University, said that today’s China is more traditional than modern. Ancient China created a splendid Chinese civilization, and modern China will definitely make Chinese civilization move towards a better future. New glory.

;

;“Today, China’s achievements have attracted global attention. More and more countries are paying more attention to and studying China, and Ethiopia’s China Studies research is also growing.” Former Ethiopian Prime Minister Hailemariam said in a speech In the video speech, he said that this forum, with the theme of "Chinese Civilization and China's Road from a Global Perspective", provides a valuable exchange opportunity for everyone to conduct in-depth discussions on the great significance of the innovative practice of the Chinese nation's modern civilization.

;

;“Only by tracing back to the source of history can we understand the real world, and by following the foundation of culture can we identify today’s China. In his congratulatory letter, President Xi Jinping gave us methodological guidance on how to understand ancient China and understand modern China from a deeper level in the future. China, China that grasps the future." After studying President Xi Jinping's congratulatory letter, Peng Jun, director of the Foreign Exchange and Cooperation Department of Xiamen Culture and Tourism Bureau, Fujian Province, said.

;

;;Promote exchanges and mutual learning among civilizations in equal exchanges;

;

;President Xi Jinping pointed out in his congratulatory letter: "Chinese civilization has a long history, and in exchanges and mutual interactions with other civilizations in the world Learning from China enriches development and gives Chinese-style modernization a profound foundation." In this regard, Zhou Wu, deputy director of the Institute of World Chinese Studies, Shanghai Academy of Social Sciences, was deeply touched: "Chinese-style modernization is deeply rooted in China's excellent traditional culture. It also pays attention to learning from and absorbing all the outstanding achievements of human civilization, represents the development direction of human civilization progress, presents a new picture that is different from the Western modernization model, and provides powerful guidance for mankind to solve the problems of the times and achieve common development."

;

;In the view of Victor Cortizo, Vice Chairman of the Spanish Zhihua Lecture Hall, only when different civilizations join hands and engage in equal dialogue and exchange can we find a way to deal with the various risks and challenges faced by human society. "From the perspective of promoting exchanges and mutual learning among civilizations, the study of China studies can promote mutual understanding, mutual learning, and common progress between Chinese and foreign cultures. China has achieved historic achievements that have attracted global attention over decades of development, and the unique wisdom it has displayed is worthy of Other countries can learn from this," said Victor Cortizo.

;

;Listening to President Xi Jinping’s congratulatory message on the spot, Xu Baofeng, dean of the Belt and Road Research Institute at Beijing Language and Culture University and director of the World Sinology Center, was inspired and felt increasingly responsible.

;

;"President Xi Jinping emphasized in his congratulatory letter that 'only through mutual learning among civilizations can we achieve common progress', which has injected momentum into our next work." Xu Baofeng said, "Promoting exchanges and mutual learning among civilizations demonstrates the This has reflected the open and inclusive mind of the Chinese Communists. We look forward to building more regional, thematic, and in-depth international exchange platforms in the future. Beijing Language and Culture University will better implement the spirit of President Xi Jinping’s congratulatory letter in future teaching work. Cultivate more young talents who are committed to promoting exchanges and mutual learning among civilizations, and contribute to promoting the people-to-people bonds of all countries."

;

;;Be a good ambassador for integrating Chinese and foreign civilizations;

;

; After listening to President Xi Jinping’s encouragement and expectations for experts and scholars from various countries in his congratulatory letter, Lee Jung-nam, director of the China Studies Center at the Institute of Asian Studies at Korea University, said that he will continue to be a “messenger to integrate Chinese and foreign civilizations” and strive to bring professional academic discourse to the forefront. Transform it into easy-to-understand public expressions, tell a true, three-dimensional, and comprehensive China to the Korean people, continue to improve the public opinion basis for relations between the two countries, and play its role in promoting mutual understanding and mutual understanding between the people of South Korea and China.

;

;"In his congratulatory letter, President Xi Jinping proposed being inclusive, open and inclusive. This is out of in-depth thinking about the diversity of human civilization. Only by respecting the humanistic history and values ​​of different nations can we work together to solve global challenges ." Shi Hanwei, a German expert who has studied China studies for more than 50 years, said that this concept has always been advocated by Chinese culture and will make greater contributions to peacefully solving international problems and building a better world.

;

;Jiao Yanan, an associate professor at the School of International Education of Shandong University who has long been engaged in teaching Chinese as a foreign language, said: "After studying President Xi Jinping's congratulatory letter, I am more aware of the importance of this cause. We will be guided by the spirit of the congratulatory letter. , relying on Chinese language teaching, to allow more Chinese language learners from all over the world to appreciate the charm of Chinese culture, perceive the style of contemporary China, and better assist the international promotion of Chinese language and the international dissemination of Chinese culture.”

;

;President Xi Jinping’s The congratulatory letter gave Wu Xueyong, director of the Hangzhou Branch of the National Library of China, a deeper understanding of cultural inheritance and exchange. He said that as a national cultural palace in the new era, the National Edition Museum in Hangzhou should collect, protect and inherit excellent editions of Chinese classics, and make greater contributions to telling the Chinese story to the world and promoting exchanges and mutual learning between Chinese and foreign civilizations.

;

;(Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, November 24)

;; Sat, 25 Nov 2023 05:56:04 +0800 01版要闻 - 李强主持召开国务院常务会议http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/25/nw.D110000renmrb_20231125_4-01.htm
;Saturday, November 25, 2023
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 24th  Premier Li Qiang of the State Council chaired an executive meeting of the State Council on November 24th. We studied and strengthened work safety at the end of the year and the beginning of the year, and reviewed and approved the "Action Plan for Continuous Improvement of Air Quality" and the "Regulations on the Supervision and Management of Non-Bank Payment Institutions".

;

;The meeting pointed out that since the beginning of this year, the safety production situation across the country has been generally stable, but accidents have occurred in some places recently, some causing heavy casualties, and the lessons have been profound. All kinds of accidents are prone to occur at the end of the year and the beginning of the year. We must thoroughly implement the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping’s series of important instructions on production safety, insist on drawing inferences from one example, strictly investigate and guard against various risks and hidden dangers, resolutely prevent and contain major accidents, and make every effort to safeguard the The safety of people’s lives and property. It is necessary to keep a close eye on key industries and, based on the characteristics of winter accidents, carry out in-depth and detailed investigations into energy, construction, transportation and other industries to thoroughly rectify existing risks and hazards and ensure that all safety responsibility measures are implemented. It is necessary to highlight key areas, focus on places with many accidents and hidden dangers, strengthen supervision and guidance, and truly consolidate the pressure to all levels and transmit it to the lowest level. It is necessary to thoroughly investigate blind spots of loopholes, carry out investigation and rectification with full coverage and no blind spots, and speed up the filling of shortcomings in management systems, technical standards and other aspects.

;

;The meeting emphasized the need to thoroughly implement the Party Central Committee’s decisions and arrangements on fighting a tough battle against pollution, make persistent efforts and achieve long-term results, and solidly and deeply promote the continuous improvement of air quality. It is necessary to coordinate high-level protection and high-quality development, accelerate the green and low-carbon transformation of industry, energy, transportation, etc., strive to build a green and low-carbon circular economic system, and effectively enhance development potential and stamina. It is necessary to mobilize all sectors of society to participate in the prevention and control of air pollution, further strengthen knowledge popularization and policy publicity, proactively respond to social concerns, and create a good atmosphere that jointly promotes continuous improvement of air quality.

;

;The meeting pointed out that the development of the non-bank payment industry plays an important role in activating transactions and prospering the market, and has made positive contributions to the development of the real economy and the improvement of people's livelihood. It is necessary to guide payment institutions to firmly establish the concept of "payment for the people", adhere to the purpose of small amounts and convenience, focus on the main business, improve services, and better meet the payment and settlement needs of users. It is necessary to take the implementation of the "Regulations on the Supervision and Administration of Non-bank Payment Institutions" as an opportunity to strengthen full-chain and full-cycle supervision, strictly control the access of payment institutions, prevent risks such as business alienation, fund misappropriation, and data leakage, and strictly prevent the use of payment platforms to engage in illegal fund-raising. , telecommunications network fraud and other illegal and criminal activities, and promote healthy competition and standardized healthy development of the industry.

;

;Other matters were also considered at the meeting.

;; Sat, 25 Nov 2023 05:56:04 +0800 01版要闻 - 二十届首都规划建设委员会第二次全体会议在京召开http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/25/nw.D110000renmrb_20231125_5-01.htm
;Saturday, November 25, 2023
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 24th  The Second Plenary Meeting of the 20th Capital Planning and Construction Committee11 It was held in Beijing on September 24th. Cai Qi, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and director of the First Planning Committee, attended the meeting and delivered a speech.

;

;The meeting pointed out that the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core has always placed the planning and construction of the capital in a prominent position. General Secretary Xi Jinping made important instructions when inspecting post-disaster recovery and reconstruction work in Beijing and Hebei, and put forward new requirements for the planning and construction of the capital. Promoting the great cause of building a strong country and rejuvenating the nation with Chinese-style modernization has given the planning and construction of the capital a new mission. Member units of the First Planning Committee should further enhance their sense of mission and responsibility for the planning and construction of the capital, deeply understand the decisive significance of the "two establishments", enhance the "four consciousnesses", strengthen the "four self-confidences", and achieve "two maintenances" , adhere to the centralized and unified leadership of the Party Central Committee on the planning and construction of the capital, and ensure that all decisions and arrangements are implemented and effective.

;

;The meeting emphasized that adhering to the functional positioning of the "four centers" and establishing an urban physical examination and evaluation mechanism are important institutional arrangements for deepening and improving the capital planning implementation system and maintaining the seriousness and authority of the planning. It is necessary to conscientiously make rectifications of the problems discovered during the physical examination and evaluation, forming a closed loop of work from planning preparation, plan implementation to physical examination and evaluation, and promote the capital planning step by step from a "vision map" to a "real scene map." It is necessary to resolutely and orderly decentralize Beijing’s non-capital functions and continuously optimize and improve the central government affairs environment. Carry out urban renewal in depth and make up for the shortcomings of urban construction. Improve the overall living environment and persistently solve the urgent, difficult and anxious problems of the masses. We will make every effort to promote the application and protection of the central axis, and do a good job in the protection and utilization of cultural relics after they are evacuated. We will do a good job in post-disaster recovery and reconstruction and comprehensively improve disaster prevention, reduction and relief capabilities. We should coordinate development and security, adhere to bottom-line thinking, promote the construction of resilient cities, and improve the level of safe urban operation. Strengthen research on deep-seated issues such as cracking "big city diseases", alleviation and utilization, and coordinated development of Beijing, Tianjin and Hebei, and provide policy support and guarantees.

;

;The meeting requested that the capital planning implementation mechanism be improved. The First Planning Committee should strengthen the overall coordination, overall promotion and supervision of the capital's planning and construction. Beijing must implement its main responsibilities and improve the level of "four services". The member units of the First Planning Committee must jointly shoulder the responsibility of protecting the plan and support the work of Beijing. The Office of the First Planning Commission must implement an integrated working mechanism to coordinate and promote all parties to implement various tasks in the planning and construction of the capital.

;

;The meeting listened to reports on the implementation of the 2022 Beijing City Master Plan, Capital Functional Core Area Control Regulations, and Beijing City Sub-center Control Regulations, and reviewed and approved the "Capital Planning and Construction Committee Working Rules" and "Capital Planning and Construction Committee Working Rules" Planning and Construction Committee Office Working Rules" and other documents.

;

;Yin Li, member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and director of the First Planning Committee, presided over the meeting. The deputy director and members of the First Planning Committee attended the meeting.

So far, ARJ21 aircraft has carried more than 10 million passengers.

;

;The ARJ21 aircraft is a regional jet airliner independently developed by my country. Since it was officially put into commercial operation in June 2016, COMAC has delivered a total of 117 aircraft to a number of airlines and opened 400 domestic and international routes. There are more than 140 navigable cities in Yutiao, and nearly 1,800 flights are operated every week. In order to serve airline users, COMAC has established an operation support system to ensure the large-scale development of ARJ21.

;

;Currently, ARJ21 is actively expanding domestic and foreign markets. Domestically, ARJ21 has withstood the extreme cold test of minus 50 degrees Celsius, and has initially formed a route network covering North China, Northeast China, East China, Northwest China, Southwest, Central and South China and other regions; overseas, operations in Southeast Asia have made a good start, and two ARJ21s have been put into Indonesia. For domestic and Malaysian international routes, since August 2023, the daily utilization rate of the overseas fleet has stabilized at more than 8 hours, and the aircraft performance has been recognized by overseas customers.

;

;At the same time, new progress has been made in serialization development. The first two ARJ21 cargo aircraft have been delivered, which means that ARJ21 can not only fly civil aviation passenger flights, but also become an air logistics "postman". In addition to cargo aircraft, ARJ21 business jets and medical aircraft have received airworthiness approval from the Civil Aviation Administration of China, and derivative models such as emergency rescue command aircraft and fire extinguishers are being advanced in an orderly manner.

;; Sat, 25 Nov 2023 05:56:04 +0800 02版要闻 - 李强会见法国外长科隆纳http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/25/nw.D110000renmrb_20231125_1-02.htm
;Saturday, November 25, 2023
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 24th  Premier Li Qiang of the State Council met at the Great Hall of the People on the morning of November 24th French Foreign Minister Colonna.

;

;Li Qiang said that since this year, under the strategic guidance of President Xi Jinping and President Macron, China-France relations have developed steadily, injecting certainty and positive energy into the world with its own stability. China is willing to work with France to implement the important consensus reached by the two heads of state, and take the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and France next year as an opportunity to build on the past and build on the future, making China-France relations more stable and dynamic, and better promoting the prosperity and development of the two countries and the world.

;

;Li Qiang pointed out that since the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and France, they have always respected each other and treated each other as equals, which is a valuable asset of the relations between the two countries. Looking into the future, both sides should respect and trust each other, work together for mutual benefit and win-win results, and work together in times of difficulty, continue to strengthen high-level exchanges, insist on taking care of each other's core interests and major concerns, and continue to implement the comprehensive strategic partnership. China will continue to promote high-level opening up and deepen mutually beneficial cooperation between the two sides. It hopes that France will provide a fair, just and non-discriminatory market environment for Chinese enterprises to invest and operate in France, and at the same time actively promote the European side to adhere to the spirit of market openness and free trade. In the face of increasing global challenges, China is willing to work closely with France to jointly address pressing issues such as climate change and biodiversity protection, actively implement global development initiatives, global security initiatives, and global civilization initiatives, and jointly promote the building of a community with a shared future for mankind. .

;

;Colonna said that France and China are both permanent members of the United Nations Security Council and shoulder the common responsibility of maintaining world peace and development. France is willing to take the opportunity of celebrating the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between France and China to intensify high-level exchanges, strengthen political mutual trust, further deepen exchanges and cooperation in the fields of economy, trade, people-to-people and cultural exchanges, maintain market openness, and jointly respond to global challenges such as climate change and biodiversity protection. , play the role of a major country in safeguarding world peace and promoting common development.
